snippet: M. Ward, busy of late with side projects like She & Him and the Monsters of Folk, has a new solo album: “A Wasteland Companion.”
abstract: Indie folk-rock musician M Ward describes the musical influences in his latest solo album A Wasteland Companion.
lead_paragraph: M. Ward, busy of late with side projects like She & Him and the Monsters of Folk, has a new solo album: “A Wasteland Companion.”

headline.seo: M. Ward on His New Solo Album, ‘A Wasteland Companion’
headline.main: Stepping Out of the Shadows With a Sunnier Sound
headline.print_headline: Stepping Out of the Shadows With a Sunnier Sound
